text:
Hey Makara, when you submit your theme to the asset marketplace, you can submit it with a price attached. Per the Submission requirement you mentioned above, during the judging portion of the contest, we (HubSpot) will be providing your theme free of charge for testing, evaluation, and use by the Sponsor and Judges during the contest and until the judging period ends.

Let me know if that helps clear that up :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U2H3TT8F2> ok am clear so i can set price $100 ore more and HubSpot team and judges can download my theme for testing.

Correct, if you wanted to submit your theme with a price of $100, that is totally fine to do. We will deliver the theme to the judges on our end as free (no worries, once the contest ends, they will no longer have access to it :slightly_smiling_face: so they cant just walk away with a free theme).
